mapper.insert: insert into group_buy_activity (activity_id, activity_name, discount_id, group_type, take_limit_count, target, valid_time, status, start_time, end_time, tag_id, tag_scope, create_time, update_time) values (#{activityId}, #{activityName}, #{discountId}, #{groupType}, #{takeLimitCount}, #{target}, #{validTime}, #{status}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{tagId}, #{tagScope}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select activity_id, activity_name, discount_id, group_type, take_limit_count, target, valid_time, status, start_time, end_time, tag_id, tag_scope from group_buy_activity where activity_id = #{activityId} order by id desc limit 1
